content: That's great, thank you for the tips and prompts! I'm excited to explore my art journal and see where it takes me. I've been feeling inspired by all the art exhibitions I've been attending lately, including the one at the museum on April 15th, where I saw an incredible collection of impressionist paintings. I think my art journal will be a great way to process all the inspiration I've been feeling. Speaking of which, do you have any recommendations for art books or catalogs that might further inspire me?
